examples: She had incurred the wrath of her father by marrying without his consent.
Había provocado la ira de su padre al casarse sin su consentimiento.
You risk incurring bank charges if you exceed your overdraft limit.
Corre el riesgo de incurrir en cargos bancarios si excede su límite de sobregiro.
Our first step would be to incur a national debt.
Nuestro primer paso sería contraer una deuda pública.
... coal would have to incur costs of the order of ...
... el carbón tendría que incurrir en costes del orden de ...
